noPages.label: This project does not contain any pages.

toc.label: Table of Contents
toc.htmlDescription: Use the tab key to select a page. Press space to go to that page.

errorPage.label: No template is currently available for this page type.

errorBrowser.label: Your browser does not fully support this page type.

errorEmbed.label: You have embedded an XOT project preview. You must make the project public and embed the public facing URL.

pageDeprecatedCeased.label: This page has been deprecated as the service has ceased.

errorQuestions.noA: No answer options have been added

errorFlash.label: You need to install the Flash Player to view this content.

authorSupport.label: Author Support is ON: text shown in red will not appear in live projects.

hiddenPage.label: This page will be hidden in live projects
hiddenPage.hidden: This page is currently hidden in live projects
hiddenPage.shown: This page is currently shown in live projects

hiddenSection.label: This section will be hidden in live projects
hiddenSection.hidden: This section is currently hidden in live projects
hiddenSection.shown: This section is currently shown in live projects

microphoneError.label:
Unable to access your microphone. Common reasons for this problem include:

  • No microphone detected
  • This web page has been blocked from accessing the microphone
  • The microphone is already in use by another program or browser tab

radioButton.selected: selected. Use the arrow keys to choose from the options

comboBox.name: ComboBox
comboBox.selectedOptions: selected. Use the arrow keys to select

hotSpot.name: HotSpot
hotSpot.toSelect: Hot Spot. Press Space to select.

targetArea.name: Target Area
targetArea.toSelect: Press space to drop the selected item.

selectTxt.label: Please select from the options below

adviceTxt.label: Need more advice? Visit the Xerte Online Toolkits guide to accessibility.

wcagLogo.label: WCAG WAI-AA logo and link to Xerte accessibility statement

invert.label: Invert, High contrast theme, no background images

blackYellow.label: Black on Yellow theme, no background images

screenReaderInfo.label: Screen Reader Information
screenReaderInfo.newWindow: This link will open in a new window
screenReaderInfo.thisWindow: This link will open in this window
screenReaderInfo.dialog: This button will open a dialog window

buttonNav.description: This page contains a series of buttons where each one reveals some related information.

slideshow.description: This page contains a slideshow where clicking the next and previous buttons changes the information presented.

audioSlideshow.description: This page displays content in synch with an audio files. New content is added to the page as the audio plays.

videoSynch.description: This page displays content in synch with a video. New content is added to the page as the video plays.

list.description: This page contains a series of links where each one reveals some related information.

mcq.description: This page contains a multiple choice question. Use the tab and up/down arrow keys to explore possible answers and click Space to select your answer.

quiz.description: This page contains a series of multiple choice questions. Use the tab and up/down arrow keys to explore possible answers and click Space to select your answer.

trackingCloseTxt.label: Do you want to stop with this session and continue later? If so, please press the button below to save this session.

closeTxt.label: Your session has been saved. You can now close the browser window or browser tab of this LO.

closeTxtEmbedded.label: Your session has been saved. You need to revisit this resource to access the session again.

trackingCloseTxtLtiOnly.label: Do you want to stop with this session? If so, please press the button below to stop this session and send the grade to the LMS.

closeTxtLtiOnly.label: Your session has been stopped. You can now close the browser window or browser tab of this LO.

closeTxtEmbeddedLtiOnly.label: Your session has been stopped. You need to revisit this resource to restart the content again.

resumeTxt.label: Welcome back. Do you want to resume the session of {date} {time}? Choose 'Yes' to resume the session. Choose 'No' to start a new session.

closeTxtNo.label: Close this window to start a new session.

closeTxtYes.label: Close this window to resume the session.

cancelTxtYes.label: You can now close the browser window or browser tab.

info.none: All possible values are excluded or fall outside the min & max range
info.none2: {n} attempts have not returned an accepted value
info.attempts: {n} attempts to calculate a valid value

password.label: Access code
password.pageSupport: In live projects, an access code must be entered to view this page
password.sectionSupport: In live projects, an access code must be entered to view this section

search.title: Search
search.noMatch1: No pages or sections match your selection.
search.noMatch2: No pages or sections completely match your criteria. Partial matches are listed below.

scormTrackingAlert.warning: Please note: SCORM mode is '{0}'. This means that your progress, interactions and results from this viewing will not be tracked or saved. For tracking you should start a new attempt.
